title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 880.1 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 880.1 - Definitions

State Regulations

For the purposes of this Subchapter, except as otherwise
required by the context: (a) Person
means any person, corporation, partnership, association, trust, or other
entity, public or private. (b) Water
user means any person who uses, takes, withdraws or diverts surface waters
within the Delaware River Basin. (c) Executive director means the executive director of the Delaware River Basin

Commission. (d) Consumptive use
means the water lost due to transpiration from vegetation in the building of
plant tissue, incorporated into products during their manufacture, lost to the
atmosphere from cooling devices, evaporated from water surfaces, exported from
the Delaware River Basin, or any other water use for which the water withdrawn
is not returned to the surface waters on the basin undiminished in
quantity. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
880.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
